_header: Jesu that heaven and earth began
_description: Tale of an incestuous daughter — twenty-four 6-line stanzas

BodRawPoe118.First Lines:
Ihesu þat heuyn & erthe beganAnd aftyr hys forme made
                    man…
BodRawPoe118.Last Lines:
…In to ioye for to wendeAmen lord for þi
                    grace
BodRawPoe118.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Nachträge zu den Legenden 5: The Messengers of Death.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         79 (1887): 411-70: 421-4.
Heuser,  Wilhelm. 
             “Dux Moraud, einzelrolle aus” 
         30 (1907): 180-208: 201-5; see Thum (1892)
XThum,  Albert Otto. 
             “Untersuchungen über die mittelenglische fromme erzaelung, ‘A
                Tale of an Incestuous Daughter’.”  Diss. Rostock. Berlin, 1892.
